data.name: Quartz
data.detailed_description:
QUARTZ offers a VR toolkit dedicated to illustration and art exhbition.
Thanks to a panel of intuitive and complete tools, it lets you create, share and visualize artworks in virtual reality.

You can paint whatever you want on all kinds of canvases in different environments and exhibit your creations in your virtual gallery.

  • Create
Import your 3D models (fbx) as canvas or select one in app and start painting from a blank page or your own concept art.
With spray, marker, stencil and eraser tools, you have everything you need to create whatever you want.
Combine them with a brush to open your style, use color charts or create your own to unleash your creativity!

  • Exhibit
More than a painting software, Quartz lets you create your own gallery.
Exhibit your works and watch the creation process thanks to the replay mode.
Import your artworks created from-third party software (png, jpeg) to share them in a virtual world.

  • Share
Export yout works to use them whatever you want.
Get inspired and improve your skills by watching community creations.
Follow your favorite artists, works and exhibitions.
Create your profile and expand your community!

Key features
  • Painting simulator
  • Import 3D models, 2D artworks and sketches
  • Export artwork
  • Virtual gallery and replay
  • Social interactions

data.short_description: Create, exhibit and share your artworks in VR! Quartz is an amazing toolbox for beginners or experienced artists. One limit: Your imagination!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
